name: Jumping Squares
description:
Jump and dash your way into the near-impossible platformer, Jumping Squares! Complete various levels and become a master in rhythm-based platformer games! Try this game out now, and challenge yourself!

Read before commenting: This game is not a copy, modification or related to RobTop's Geometry Dash, Geometry Dash Subzero, Geometry Dash Meltdown or Geometry Dash World. All assets in this game are completely different and do not resemble any assets in the games mentioned above.
